summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to community advisory councils; authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to enter into an agreement with the Associated Recreation Council for the purpose of assisting in planning and implementing recreational activities, life-long learning and other programs for the public, and coordinating and supporting the activities of community advisory councils; amending Sections 18.04.010 and 18.04.050, and repealing Sections 18.04.020, 18.04.030 and 18.04.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
